snippet: The student loan interest rate fight is a distraction from the crisis of college affordability.
abstract: Op-Ed article by FinAid.org publisher Mark Kantrowitz and author Lynn O'Shaughnessy argues that the Congressional battle over extending Stafford loan rates ignores far more important issues facing young students, like the starved Pell program and soaring tuition levels.

byline.original: By MARK KANTROWITZ and LYNN O'SHAUGHNESSY

lead_paragraph: The student loan interest rate fight is a distraction from the crisis of college affordability.

headline.print_headline: Much Ado About Double or Nothing
headline.main: Much Ado About Double or Nothing
